events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster for software development roles.
A recruiter specialized in engineering hires has been assigned to your application to guide you through the process.
We completed an initial screening of your resume and profile; the hiring team is impressed with your software development experience.
You responded promptly to our screening questions, which helps us move forward smoothly with your application process.
We have scheduled your technical interview for April 10th at 2 PM UTC with our senior software engineers.
You successfully completed the technical interview. The interviewers appreciated your problem-solving skills and coding proficiency.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for April 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture and benefits.
You completed the HR interview. The team was pleased with your communication skills and alignment with company values.
We have extended an official offer to you for the Software Engineer role with a competitive salary and benefits package.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering department.
You accepted our offer officially. We are excited to have you on board as part of the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has begun with orientation sessions and setup of your software development environment.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful onboarding. Welcome to the engineering team!
